item.title: 印度亿万富豪俱乐部扩大，Groww Parents 股票大涨
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 对制裁的担忧暂时阻碍了俄罗斯到中国的石油运输
item.description: 对中国港口和炼油厂的制裁不断扩大，扼制了俄罗斯和伊朗石油流向世界头号进口国，但新出现的变通办法表明，这种放缓可能稍纵即逝。【原文：Expanding sanctions on Chinese ports and refiners are choking flows of Russian and Iranian oil to the world’s No. 1 importer, although emerging workarounds suggest the slowdown may be fleeting.】

item.title: 澳大利亚财富基金因风险上升而推高黄金和股票价格
item.description: 澳大利亚主权财富基金警告说，全球经济受到冲击的风险正在上升，该基金已增持黄金、积极管理的股票和对冲基金，作为潜在的缓冲。【原文：Australia’s sovereign wealth fund warned that the risk of shocks across the global economy is rising and has bolstered its holdings of gold, actively managed stocks and hedge funds as potential cushions.】

item.title: 稀土钇飙升至创纪录水平，涨幅接近 1,500
item.description: 稀土元素氧化钇在今年飙升近 1,500% 后创下历史新高，凸显了中国贸易限制的影响。【原文：Rare-earth element yttrium oxide has hit an all-time high after surging almost 1,500% this year, highlighting the fallout of trade curbs from China.】

item.title: 与上田会谈前日元和债券给高市带来压力
item.description: 日本首相高市真奈在与日本央行行长上田一夫会晤前面临着越来越大的压力，要求她软化对日本央行政策的立场，并公布一个具有可信融资计划的经济方案，因为日元和政府债券都在下跌。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi faces mounting pressure to soften her stance on Bank of Japan policy and unveil an economic package with a credible funding plan as the yen and government bonds lose ground ahead of her meeting with BOJ Governor Kazuo Ueda.】

item.title: 日元跌破 155，日本片山加强外汇警告
item.description: 随着日元汇率跌破每美元 155 美元的水平，日本财务大臣加强了对日元汇率下滑的警告，因为有关经济一揽子计划规模超过预期的报道助长了这样一种观点，即首相佐那江隆一的亲刺激立场可能会减缓日本央行的加息步伐。【原文：Japan’s Finance Minister strengthened her warning over the yen’s slide as the currency fell past the 155-per-dollar level, as reports of a larger-than-expected economic package fuels the view that Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s pro-stimulus stance may slow Bank of Japan rate hikes.】

item.title: 中国开始销售欧元债券，拟筹资 40 亿欧元
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士说，中国开始推销欧元主权债券，以筹集多达 40 亿欧元（46 亿美元）的资金。【原文：China began marketing euro-denominated sovereign bonds to raise as much as €4 billion ($4.6 billion), a person familiar with the matter said, fresh off a recent offering of dollar notes that met with strong demand.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行董事会将保持谨慎，在不确定性中依赖数据
item.description: 11 月 3-4 日的会议纪要显示，澳大利亚央行董事会成员在决定本月维持利率设置不变时，讨论了近期通胀飙升的影响、劳动力市场前景以及货币政策是否仍然具有限制性等问题。【原文：Australia’s central bank board members discussed the implications of a recent spike in inflation, the outlook for the labor market and whether monetary policy was still restrictive when deciding to leave interest-rate settings unchanged this month, minutes of its Nov. 3-4 meeting showed.】

item.title: 英国将于下月把银行存款保险上限提高至 12 万英镑
item.description: 英格兰银行的监管部门正在提高储蓄者在金融机构倒闭时的保证取回金额，这比它今年早些时候提出的计划更进一步。【原文：The Bank of England’s regulatory arm is lifting the amount that savers are guaranteed to get back in case of the failure of a financial institution, going further than plans it had floated earlier this year.】

item.title: 推出 iPhone Air 的苹果设计师离开公司
item.description: 帮助苹果公司开发 iPhone Air 并出演其介绍视频的设计师已经离职，这标志着该公司的设计团队遭遇了最新挫折。【原文：The Apple Inc. designer who helped develop the iPhone Air — and even starred in its introduction video — has left, marking the latest setback for the company’s design group.】

item.title: 澳大利亚顶级银行家称住房市场热度引发担忧
item.description: 澳大利亚联邦银行（Commonwealth Bank of Australia）首席执行官马特-科明（Matt Comyn）暗示，目前为澳大利亚房地产市场提供信贷资金的活跃程度已经达到了令政策制定者担忧的程度。【原文：Commonwealth Bank of Australia Chief Executive Officer Matt Comyn hinted that the current buoyancy in credit funding the nation’s housing market has reached a level that is concerning to policymakers.】

item.title: 软银以 65 亿美元收购芯片公司 Ampere 的交易获得美国联邦贸易委员会批准
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会已经结束了对软银集团收购半导体设计公司 Ampere Computing LLC 的审查，为这笔价值 65 亿美元的交易扫清了障碍。【原文：The US Federal Trade Commission has ended its review of SoftBank Group Corp.’s acquisition of semiconductor designer Ampere Computing LLC, removing an obstacle to the $6.5 billion deal.】

item.title: 全球石油供应过剩，俄罗斯制裁成为焦点，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 投资者在权衡新出现的盈余和美国对俄罗斯的制裁对原油流动的影响后，石油价格趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied as investors weighed the impact from an emerging surplus against US sanctions on Russia that have upended some crude flows.】

item.title: 小米因智能手机和电动汽车疑虑而沦为中国最差科技股
item.description: 小米公司在短短几个月内从市场宠儿变成了表现最差的中国科技股，在智能手机和电动汽车市场逆风的情况下，迅速东山再起似乎充满挑战。【原文：Xiaomi Corp. has gone from market darling to the worst-performing Chinese technology stock in just a few short months, and a quick comeback looks challenging amid headwinds in the smartphone and electric vehicle markets.】

item.title: 美国降息前景因数据空白而扑朔迷离，黄金收住跌势
item.description: 受美国下月降息预期减弱的支撑，黄金在连续三天下跌后企稳。【原文：Gold steadied, after three days of losses underpinned by fading expectations of a US interest rate cut next month.】

item.title: 银行家对香港房地产的担忧加深
item.description: 香港银行家和监管机构对该市自亚洲金融危机以来最严重的房地产衰退表示日益担忧。【原文：Hong Kong bankers and regulators are signaling growing concern over the city’s deepest real estate downturn since the Asian financial crisis.】

item.title: General Atlantic 投资独角兽 SmartHR，进军日本市场
item.description: General Atlantic 完成了其在日本的首笔成长型股权投资，并计划进行更多投资，理由是日本长期以来被认为是初创企业的落后地区，但创业精神却在不断增强。【原文：General Atlantic completed its first growth equity investment in Japan and plans to do more, citing an increase in entrepreneurship in a country long considered a backwater for startups.】

item.title: 力拓削减澳大利亚氧化铝厂产量以降低成本
item.description: 力拓集团（Rio Tinto Group）位于澳大利亚的亚尔文氧化铝精炼厂的产量将减少近一半，因为废料库存已达到产能，该公司正努力降低成本，同时探索延长工厂寿命的方法。【原文：Rio Tinto Group will almost halve production at its Yarwun Alumina refinery in Australia as a waste stockpile reaches capacity and the company seeks to cut cost while exploring ways extend the plant’s life.】

item.title: Lumexa Imaging 提交美国首次公开募股申请，披露亏损缩减情况
item.description: 由私人投资公司 Welsh Carson Anderson & Stowe 支持的连锁诊断成像提供商 Lumexa Imaging Holdings Inc.【原文：Lumexa Imaging Holdings Inc., a chain of diagnostic imaging providers backed by private equtiy firm Welsh Carson Anderson & Stowe, filed for an initial public offering, disclosing growing revenue and shrinking losses.】

item.title: 华平全球 PE 基金首轮募集 120 亿美元
item.description: 华平投资公司（Warburg Pincus）为其最新的全球私募股权基金设定了 170 亿美元的目标，迄今已募集到约 70% 的资金，这使其有望在全行业筹款依然低迷的情况下实现目标。【原文：Warburg Pincus has collected about 70% of a $17 billion target so far for its latest global private equity vehicle, putting it on pace to beat its goal even as fundraising remains sluggish industrywide.】

item.title: Cold Stone Creamery 所有者探索潜在出售及其他选择
item.description: Cold Stone Creamery、Wetzel's Pretzels 和 Mr. Sub 等美国和加拿大连锁餐厅的所有者表示，公司正在进行战略审查，可能会出售自己。【原文：The owner of US and Canadian restaurant chains such as Cold Stone Creamery, Wetzel’s Pretzels and Mr. Sub said it’s undergoing a strategic review and may sell itself.】

item.title: 跌势加深，亚洲股市注定下跌：市场综述
item.description: 由于投资者回避风险较高的资产，亚洲股市周二准备下跌，反映出投资者在英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Asian stocks were poised to drop Tuesday as investors shunned riskier assets, reflecting caution ahead of Nvidia Corp.’s earnings and a US jobs report later this week.】

item.title: 债务期限临近，新堡垒能源公司正在进行债务延期谈判
item.description: Wes Edens 的新堡垒能源公司（New Fortress Energy Inc.【原文：Wes Edens’ New Fortress Energy Inc. is in talks with creditors over a forbearance agreement as it runs out of time to pay interest due on some of its debt amid struggles with project delays and cash flow.】

item.title: Arm 将在人工智能数据中心芯片中提供 Nvidia 的 NVLink 技术
item.description: Arm Holdings Plc 计划开始将 Nvidia 公司的 NVLink 技术纳入人工智能数据中心的芯片设计中，从而加强两家有影响力的半导体公司之间的关系。【原文：Arm Holdings Plc plans to start incorporating Nvidia Corp.’s NVLink technology into chip designs for AI data centers, tightening the relationship between two influential semiconductor companies.】

item.title: 阻止基金退出后，蓝猫头鹰跌至 2023 年低点
item.description: Blue Owl Capital Inc. 的股价跌至 2023 年 12 月以来的最低水平，此前这家另类资产管理公司限制投资者从其最古老的私募信贷基金之一中赎回资金。【原文：Blue Owl Capital Inc.’s shares have fallen to their lowest level since December 2023, after the alternative asset manager restricted investors from redeeming capital from one of its oldest private credit funds.】

item.title: 丑陋 "的技术面使美股涨势面临修正风险
item.description: 研究美国股市图表形态的分析师们警钟长鸣，他们担心最近的下跌可能演变成至少 10% 的全面调整。【原文：Alarm bells are ringing for analysts who study chart patterns in the US stock market, fueling concern that the latest dip could swell into a full-blown correction of at least 10%.】

item.title: 私募股权公司如何给一家人寿保险公司留下 22 亿美元的窟窿
item.description: 在一家私募股权公司开始重组一家陷入困境的人寿保险公司近十年后，当局正在努力解决 22 亿美元的资金短缺问题。投保人担心损失会改变他们的生活。【原文：Almost a decade after a private equity firm began reshaping a struggling life insurer, authorities are grappling with a $2.2 billion shortfall. Policyholders fear life-changing losses.】

item.title: UBS O'Connor 在 Cantor 交易前失去私人信贷主管
item.description: 随着 Cantor Fitzgerald LP 最终完成对对冲基金部门的收购计划，瑞银集团资本解决方案战略的联合负责人将不再管理其基金。【原文：The co-heads of UBS O’Connor’s capital solutions strategy will no longer run its funds as Cantor Fitzgerald LP finalizes a planned acquisition of the hedge fund unit.】

item.title: 芝加哥 "就业杀手 "企业税计划遭委员会否决
item.description: 芝加哥市长布兰登-约翰逊（Brandon Johnson）提议向公司征收每名员工每月 21 美元的税款，但周一被市议会的一个委员会否决。【原文：Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson’s proposal to levy a $21-per-employee, per-month tax on companies was shot down by a city council committee on Monday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚大亨莱因哈特成为 MP 材料公司第一大股东
item.description: 澳大利亚首富吉娜-莱因哈特（Gina Rinehart）已成为美国稀土生产商MP材料公司（MP Materials Corp.【原文：Gina Rinehart, Australia’s richest person, has become the biggest shareholder in US rare-earths producer MP Materials Corp., boosting her global bet on strategic minerals.】
